tech.title: Frontend & Accessibility
details: Builds modern, component-driven interfaces using React and TypeScript.
Collaborates with designers through Figma prototypes to deliver pixel-perfect, responsive user experiences.
Develops inclusive, mobile-first web applications which exceed WCAG 2.2 accessibility standards by considering neurodiverse conditions.
Applies a user-centred, inclusive design approach to ensure seamless usability across devices and assistive technologies.

tech.title: Architecture Design
details: Applies software design principles and modular architecture for scalable applications.
Completed advanced training in React, Angular, GraphQL and software design patterns.
Implements maintainable codebases with reusable, testable components.
Collaborates across teams to define and document software architecture standards.
Developed Node.js Express Web API to handle data requests.
Develops Node.js background workers to handle AI content processing and in-app notifications.

tech.title: Authentication & Security
details: Integrated AWS Cognito to handle authentication requests.
Follows OWASP best practices to prevent security vulnerabilities: SQL Injection, XSS, and SSRF.
Performed regular Fortify scans and code reviews to maintain secure coding standards.
Implements DevSecOps practices in CI/CD pipelines to automate security validation.

tech.title: Cloud DevOps
details: Leads AWS DevOps infrastructure deployments with Terraform.
Builds CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions for multi-environment deployments.
Manages AWS services including CloudFront, Elastic Beanstalk, ECS, and RDS.
Uses Docker for containerised microservices.
Oversees production deployments, prepares release notes and ensures system stability.
Delivers out-of-hours hotfixes and production environment support to maintain uptime and reliability.

tech.title: Cloud AI Service Integrations
details: Integrated AWS Cloud AI services and OpenAI APIs to automate course creation and content generation.
Integrated AWS Polly for text-to-speech conversion and OpenAI for extracting transcripts, slides, and audio from video.
Implements automation pipelines for content transformation and learning delivery.

tech.title: AI & Machine Learning
details: Builds machine learning models using Python and Pandas for data-driven insights.
Explores graph databases like Neo4j (Cypher, D3.js) for knowledge graph visualisation.
Applies data science techniques to enhance personalization and adaptive learning experiences.
Evaluates and integrates AI/ML models to optimise product performance and recommendations.

tech.title: Testing & Performance
details: Writes Playwright tests to simulate user journeys across end-to-end stack: React, Node.js, PostgreSQL database.
Integrates Playwright tests with GitHub Actions CI/CD pipelines, ensuring all tests pass to maintain app stability and developer confidence.
Writes Jest unit tests to ensure functions meet expected behaviour and prevent bugs.
Optimises app performance, using React contexts, memoization and efficient data fetching to reduce re-renders and latency.

soft.title: Leader and Mentor
details: Champions agile software development and ceremonies: daily stand-ups, retrospectives and demos to stakeholders.
Manages backlog, refines roadmap and plans sprints to meet client expectations of feature delivery times.
Fosters a psychologically safe, rewarding culture which encourages innovation and ownership.
Encourages team growth by conducting code reviews, knowledge-sharing sessions and internal workshops.
Creates onboarding resources and technical documentation to assist developers.

soft.title: Solutionist
details: Responds rapidly to critical production issues, delivering hotfixes and restoring service stability.
Balances evolving project priorities in dynamic, high-paced agile environments without compromising quality or deadlines.
Adapts quickly to new frameworks, cloud platforms and AI technologies, integrating them into existing systems.
Demonstrates resourcefulness in overcoming technical blockers and designing scalable, future-proof solutions.

soft.title: Strategic Visionary and Innovator
details: Identifies emerging technologies and assesses their potential to improve scalability, maintainability, and accessibility.
Contributes to long-term technical roadmaps, ensuring architectural decisions align with organisational objectives.
Leads proof-of-concept initiatives to evaluate innovative solutions before full-scale adoption.
Advocates for sustainable engineering practices, balancing speed of delivery with long-term system resilience.

soft.title: Communicator
details: Translates complex technical requirements into clear, actionable insights for non-technical stakeholders.
Leads technical discussions in CivTech competitions, tenders and government projects.
Promotes transparency through comprehensive documentation of pipelines, processes and architectural decisions.
Builds strong relationships with design, product and operations teams to ensure cohesive delivery and shared accountability.
